name: INVocabulary
desc: An object for registering user-specific vocabulary that Siri requests might include.

items.name: func setVocabulary(NSOrderedSet, of: INVocabularyStringType)
items.desc: Registers the specified vocabulary strings with the user.

items.name: enum INVocabularyStringType
items.desc: Possible usages for a custom vocabulary term.

items.name: func setVocabularyStrings(NSOrderedSet, of: INVocabularyStringType)
items.desc: Registers the specified vocabulary strings with the user.
